title: You want music? Get this app.‚ú®One problem.
text: So, I absolutely love this app. It has so many choices and small artists. But one thing. When someone creates an account that is under 13 or 18 (I‚Äôm not sure) you should filter out explicit covers if albums. Yes, I know you have a explicit symbol bar but I‚Äôm not saying to completely not allow them to view it, just put a warning that this song or cover of the album is very explicit, you know? Also, I understand how important free speech is as well. I don‚Äôt agree with censoring music btw but I just thought that tool would be helpful to minors. It‚Äôs just sometimes the cover of the song will have nudity (specifically Doja Cat, lol) this review is coming from a 14 year old who just doesn‚Äôt like to see explicit covers. I hope this sounds pretty reasonable. T~ Edit: I have seen a lot of full -ish nudity on playlist covers recently. Not asking you to completely take them away but please PLEASE add a censorship to some of them. If people want to view the image, just pick a selection for it. There‚Äôs so much nudity specifically in rap album covers. Please fix this. EDIT: Hey, one more problem. I don‚Äôt own the premium version so when I play a song and an ad comes on it‚Äôs incredibly LOUD. Like, WANT A BREAK FROM THE ADS?‚Ä¶ yeah, I sure do. But not when a man‚Äôs voice that piercing my eardrum. Please automatically turn down volume when an ad break comes around. title: Spotify
text: This app is amazing. It has almost every song in the world, and I can download it and play it, even without cell service. It keeps me updated on my favorite artist and new releases. It‚Äôs truly a wonderful invention. I can look at all of my playlist, collaborate on other playlist, and mix my music taste with my friends. You can queue up a songs, depending on what you want. Spotify shuffles your music so you don‚Äôt have to listen to the same songs in the same order, and there is smart queue, where Spotify queues up songs depending on what you skip. It gives you modes to view the song you‚Äôre listening too. There is so many other awesome features this app has. You need Spotify. Thank you for your time.
